contentfulProduct.title: Luxe Mongolian Lamb Pillow Cover

images.title: lifetylenew fur ry cashmere pillow ivory

content.value: Crafted of authentic Mongolian lamb fur which is widely known for its luxurious silken feel, our pillow cover is super plush and cozy. With its beautiful texture and neutral palette, this pillow will instantly elevate any space. Mix and match with our other pillow covers for the perfectly layered look.
Due to the natural quality of real fur, each pillow is one-of-a-kind and may have variations in color

It takes time for loose wool created during the production process to work its way out of new pillows. Once the loose wool is gone, no further shedding will occur. We recommend brushing your pillow with a soft comb or brush to reduce initial shedding.
Spot-clean only. Cover may be put in the dryer with laundry to fluff the natural fur. Brush your new pillow with a soft comb or brush to reduce initial shedding.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Front: 100% Mongolian lamb fur
  • Reverse: 100% cotton
  • Due to the natural quality of real fur, each pillow is one-of-a-kind and may have variations in color
  • It takes time for loose wool created during the production process to work its way out of new pillows. Once the loose wool is gone, no further shedding will occur. We recommend brushing your pillow with a soft comb or brush to reduce initial shedding.
  • 20''x20''
  • Zipper closure
  • Insert not included
  • Crafted in China

productDescription.productDescription: Crafted of authentic Mongolian lamb fur which is widely known for its luxurious silken feel, our pillow cover is super plush and cozy. With its beautiful texture and neutral palette, this pillow will instantly elevate any space. Mix and match with our other pillow covers for the perfectly layered look.

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50buckeroos."

is looking to change retail even more dramatically."

"The brand connects with factories to selldirectto the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
